name: Erwin The Engineer
description:
Background Story

Erwin is an engineer. He loves to invent and make his own machinery. One day, Erwin wanted to test his skills by creating a multi-dimensional travel device. He never knew that he'd get it to work... As Erwin crosses parallel dimensions, he finds creatures stuck in between dimensions. Erwin decides to help return creatures back to their home dimensions as he traverses the multi-dimensional wormhole.

Goal & Controls

Enter each dimension and send all creatures home. The creatures may be hostile and Erwin's device only opens parallel dimensions temporarily.

Move - W, A, S, D

Shoot Vortex - Space

Jump through Vortex - Up, Down, Left, Right

Credits

Development: Urodela/Costa

Art: Costa/Urodela

Music: merlin.dominion
